name: UNCHIN CHIN
address: 2276 Arthur Ave Ste #A, Bronx, NY 10457, USA

reviews.text: This smoothie is so freaking good! Not too sweet, super creamy and perfect. The owner is a total sweetheart and we can't wait to order again.
Great customer service and great food, the atmosphere is really nice.
I got the chicken tenders and fries, and they were delicious! I wouldn't mind coming back and trying other stuff on the menu.

Wonderfully intimate hole in the wall spot. The owner and head chef's service ans hospitality are incredible. Every time I go, I'm met with genuine conversations and love. I recommend this spot to anybody looking for an authentic piece of the Bronx.
Delicious burgers! Owner is friendly and great service

The food was prepared with care and served beautifully. The owner is incredibly kind, and the service was outstanding.

I recently tried this new Spanish restaurant and was really impressed! The food was delicious and full of authentic flavor.
